title: Eucerin Q10 Redness Relief Soothing Anti Aging Serum, 1 Oz
description: INDICATIONS:Eucerin Redness Relief Soothing Anti Aging Serum helps reduce visible redness while it helps fight against the signs of aging. Hydrating formula with natural Licochalcone, a skin soothing extract of licorice root.The natural Coenzyme Q10 enriched formula helps visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles and restore skin youthful appearance.Licochalcone (Glycyrrhiza Inflata root extract) in an extract of the licorice root with skin soothing properties.Features of Eucerin Redness Relief Soothing Anti Aging Serum :Ultra light and comfortable texture, absorbs quickly. Fragrance-free, oil free, non-irritating, non-comedogenic.Eucerin Redness Relief products are safe and appropriate for sensitive skin and rosacea. Visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles with Natural Licochalcone Q10.Clinically proven skin care system :Provides immediate redness relief. Improves condition of visibly red skin in 4 weeks.

title: Burt's Bees Naturally Ageless Night Creme, 2-Ounce Jar
description: How to determine the expiration date:The lot code is six to seven  digits long and starts with a 0, 1, 2 or 3. To read the lot code, the  first three numbers are the day of the year the product was made (aka  Julian Date). The next two digits are the year, and the last two digits  are a batch number we use internally for identification. For example,  lot code 0400901 translates to a product made on February 9, 2009 from  Batch Number 1.
